Action Items:

  • Create detailed action plans to roll out new training programs. Assign responsibilities and set clear objectives for each plan.
  • Develop a communication plan to consistently convey the values, expectations, leadership principles throughout the organization.
  • Allocate resources (budget, time, manpower) necessary to execute the action plans effectively.
  • Establish a system for ongoing monitoring and evaluation of the implemented programs. Define key performance indicators and set up regular review sessions to track progress and make adjustments as needed.

Collateral: Go-live date, detailed action plan, engagement survey.
